long_description: This bent-shaft wood paddle is an excellent value for the advanced recreational canoeist. Wide blade provides a more powerful stroke for excellent flatwater cruising performance. Combines a 7-laminate blade and a 12-laminate shaft of light and dark hardwoods for strength, durability, stiffness and beauty. Wrap Around(TM) Rockgard(R) protects the blade tip, wrapping up around the corners onto the blade edges. Comfortable, classic palm grip minimizes hand fatigue with its asymmetrical pear shape.
short_description: This bent-shaft wood paddle is an excellent value for the advanced recreational canoeist.
